testcase.classname: Feature to test Jiva design Fabric T and A Data Entry screen functionality
testcase.name: To Test the Dyeing Process functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Woven Module...............................................passed Then Click on Fabric sourcing module........................................passed And click on Data Entry in fabric sourcing module...........................passed And Click on the T and A Data Entry Screen..................................passed And Click on the Styles Expansion...........................................passed And Click on the Filter Icon................................................passed And Search and select the IPO...............................................passed And Click on the Apply button...............................................passed And Select the IPO and Style................................................passed Then Click on Add button for Dyeing process.................................passed
